texts.definition: The enjoyment experienced when things are not going your way, but you are still in the fight; a specific type of tension.
markups: <style="Definition">The enjoyment experienced when things are not going your way, but you are still in the fight; a specific type of tension.</style>

Games typically challenge players in different ways. FUBAR Enjoyment can occur when these challenges rely on players being overwhelmed with things they need to react to while also being under time pressure, either because the pure amount of things become ridiculous or that players notice that they are somehow handling the situation. This FUBAR Enjoyment can be seen as a flow experience that presses against the competences of a player to the degree that failure seems imminent.

<style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Category:Shoot%20'em%20up%20Games">Shoot 'em up Games</link></style> such as <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/1942">1942</link></style> and <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Tempest">Tempest</link></style> forces players to fight many enemies at the same time, having to both try and hit them while avoiding to get hit by the multiple shots fired at them. The subgenre of "Bullet Hell" games rely even more on <style="CurrentLink">FUBAR Enjoyment</style> that the other <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Category:Shoot%20'em%20up%20Games">Shoot 'em up Games</link></style>.

Even if players only need to deal with one block at a time, the pure speed with which players need to react in <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Tetris">Tetris</link></style> can evoke <style="CurrentLink">FUBAR Enjoyment</style>. As an example using a different design approach to promote <style="CurrentLink">FUBAR Enjoyment</style>, zombie-based games such as the <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Left%204%20Dead%20series">Left 4 Dead series</link></style> and <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Dead%20Rising%20series">Dead Rising series</link></style> rely on players meeting huge number of enemies which try to rush the players' characters and engage in close combat.

The prime requirements for <style="CurrentLink">FUBAR Enjoyment</style> to be possible is to have <style="Link"><link="challenging-gameplay">Challenging Gameplay</link></style> in <style="Link"><link="real-time-games">Real-Time Games</link></style>. Many patterns can be used to ensure that players are under pressure while dealing with the challenges: <style="Link"><link="attention-demanding-gameplay">Attention Demanding Gameplay</link></style> and <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/The%20Show%20Must%20Go%20On">The Show Must Go On</link></style> are probably the most important ones since they deny players the chance to have control over when they should act, but <style="Link"><link="ever-increasing-difficulty">Ever Increasing Difficulty</link></style> makes sure that players that have proven able to handle certain situations are put in more difficult ones. <style="CurrentLink">FUBAR Enjoyment</style> typically also makes use of <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Simultaneous%20Challenges">Simultaneous Challenges</link></style>, which not only makes for <style="Link"><link="complex-gameplay">Complex Gameplay</link></style> but can require <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Attention%20Swapping">Attention Swapping</link></style> (which even without <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Simultaneous%20Challenges">Simultaneous Challenges</link></style> can support <style="CurrentLink">FUBAR Enjoyment</style>). <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Disruption%20of%20Focused%20Attention">Disruption of Focused Attention</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Limited%20Foresight">Limited Foresight</link></style>, and <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Limited%20Planning%20Ability">Limited Planning Ability</link></style> all work for creating more chaotic situation for players and can thereby help make an unpredictable and overwhelming gameplay situation.

For <style="Link"><link="multiplayer-games">Multiplayer Games</link></style>, the combination of <style="CurrentLink">FUBAR Enjoyment</style> with either <style="Link"><link="helplessness">Helplessness</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="mutual-goals">Mutual Goals</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="parties">Parties</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="pve">PvE</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="rescue">Rescue</link></style>, or <style="Link"><link="teams">Teams</link></style> leads to the possibility of <style="Link"><link="mutual-fubar-enjoyment">Mutual FUBAR Enjoyment</link></style>.

<style="Link"><link="survive">Survive</link></style> is a typical goal associated with <style="CurrentLink">FUBAR Enjoyment</style> and <style="Link"><link="always-vulnerable">Always Vulnerable</link></style> focuses the possibility of failure on players' <style="Link"><link="focus-loci">Focus Loci</link></style>.

While <style="CurrentLink">FUBAR Enjoyment</style> is the positive experience of <style="Link"><link="hovering-closures">Hovering Closures</link></style>, it relies on players having <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Cognitive%20Engrossment">Cognitive Engrossment</link></style> and <style="Link"><link="tension">Tension</link></style>. One reason why <style="CurrentLink">FUBAR Enjoyment</style> is enjoyable is that it lets players feel that they have <style="Link"><link="gameplay-mastery">Gameplay Mastery</link></style> and it can be argued that the pattern does make players have this since they need to play at their full abilities; another reason is that eventual failure can lead to <style="Link"><link="spectacular-failure-enjoyment">Spectacular Failure Enjoyment</link></style> since the situation was chaotic or very difficult to begin with. Regardless, games with <style="CurrentLink">FUBAR Enjoyment</style> have <style="Link"><link="performance-uncertainty">Performance Uncertainty</link></style> since players are forced to act in situations where not succeeding is a very possible outcome.

Players having <style="CurrentLink">FUBAR Enjoyment</style> may have difficulties considering <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Risk/Reward">Risk/Reward</link></style> situations since they are preoccupied with immediate problems.
